summary: This bill, titled the "Charitable Act," amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify and extend the deduction for charitable contributions for individuals who do not itemize their deductions. It specifies that for the 2026 and 2027 tax years, the deduction will be capped at one-third of the standard deduction. The bill also eliminates a penalty related to underpayments and makes conforming amendments to other sections of the code. The changes are effective for the tax years beginning after December 31, 2025.
